content.en: Wavelet algorithms: Researchers have explored the applications of algorithms in wavelet theory. The Euclidean algorithm is used to decompose wavelet transforms, while Mallat's multiresolution wavelet representation is used to derive and implement a shift-invariant wavelet transform. Other algorithms, such as the algorithme à trous and the wavethresh software, are used for discrete wavelet transforms and image compression. These algorithms have various applications in signal and image processing, including image enhancement, function approximation, and data compression.
content.da: Wavelet-algoritmer: Forskere har udforsket anvendelserne af algoritmer i wavelet-teori. Den euklidiske algoritme bruges til at dekomponere wavelet-transformationer, mens Mallats multiresolution-waveletrepræsentation bruges til at udlede og implementere en skiftinvariant wavelet-transformation. Andre algoritmer, såsom algorithme à trous og wavethresh-software, bruges til diskrete wavelet-transformationer og billedkompression. Disse algoritmer har forskellige anvendelser inden for signal- og billedbehandling, herunder billedforbedring, funktionsapproksimation og datakompression.
